title: So.. Fiora WAS pretty sexy, why are we making her now look like Cruella De Vil?
body: Yeah let's take a great looking champion and then make her look like disney did her artwork, that will make people happy.

replies.body:
http://download.gamezone.com/uploads/image/data/1136788/article_post_width_Wicked_LeBlanc.jpg
You rang?

> [{quoted}](name=Ace of Eden,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-21T19:31:39.947+0000)
>
> http://download.gamezone.com/uploads/image/data/1136788/article_post_width_Wicked_LeBlanc.jpg
> You rang?

leblanc's skin lineup is always the darn best in league. Never dissapointed
Well LeBlanc is a cold-hearted bitch both in lore and in gameplay. The skin fits.
The skin fit Leblanc though, this wouldn't fit Fiora...

they did the same with {{champion:103}} and {{champion:55}} 
kind of getting annoying
I kind of like the new Ahri splash art in comparison, but the new Katarina splash art is just a direct nerf to the champion.
Im with him, none of the new arts are worth a damn....Ahri, Kat, EZREAL, JANNA?!?! If you're going to change the splash art, leave the old art as a skin option like they did with sejuani....

New Ahri is better imo.

As for new Kat, well, I use Warring Kingdoms Kat, and it was conveniently released at around the same time. Business strategy indeed.

> [{quoted}](name=IAMS4T4N,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-21T22:03:01.588+0000)
>
> they did the same with {{champion:103}} and {{champion:55}} 
> kind of getting annoying

I hated Ahri's old splash for one reason, her left boob looked like it was barely in her dress...

as a female it bothered me.

As a guy myself, my values tell me to respect a person's body, so scantily clad women lower points in my view.

However, Ahri is based on the Nine-Tailed Fox, so it makes thematic sense at least.

Anyway, new Ahri art is better.

> [{quoted}](name=Absolute0Chaos,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2015-07-22T01:28:36.561+0000)
>
> As a guy myself, my values tell me to respect a person's body, so scantily clad women lower points in my view.
> 
> However, Ahri is based on the Nine-Tailed Fox, so it makes thematic sense at least.
> 
> Anyway, new Ahri art is better.

The sexy factor isn't what bothered me, it was the fact that her old splash dress looked _uncomfortable_. It looked as if her boob was about to fall out of her dress and be like "oops"

lol I can just imagine that coupled with the reaction.  suddenly they're hanging free on summoners rift in the middle of a teamfight and you're just like "woopsies, mah bad" and keep fighting.

at least its a good tactic.
Not at all

> [{quoted}](name=IAMS4T4N,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-07-21T22:03:01.588+0000)
>
> they did the same with {{champion:103}} and {{champion:55}} 
> kind of getting annoying

But one of those isn't Tristana...

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=00060007,timestamp=2015-07-23T03:09:22.928+0000)
>
> But one of those isn't Tristana...

at least she was ugly
Because people play this game for the sex appeal of its characters.
we do
The name fits, too.
{{champion:103}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:76}}  {{champion:44}}{{champion:22}}  for life
She looks like a cartoon now, the same can be said of her in-game models, it's a downgrade for sure.

Lol the new one looks like she's getting butt-probed.

Dat eye bulge
oh god why
That new face looks like complete shit, riots gotta clear out the tumblr artists and fix this
That face looks horrible. There was absolutely nothing wrong with the original.

I would say the clothes were a tad too dark. I didn't even know it was vertically striped on the model until today, and I own the skin.

The face in the new model is horrendous, though. I agree. I would've just touched up the clothes and made them a little brighter (to fit the League motif) and then left it at that. The model was fine.
bro are you serious...i wasn't pissed until i saw this cause i use headmistress but what the fuck? is riot serious? lmao

Old artwork was better imo.

But I'm not too worried, I have the headmistress skin :3
Headmistress face was changed in the same way, sadly.

Oh god, I haven't seen her new splashes.

Please tell me there aren't new splash arts.
I haven't seen new splashes yet, but they might do it.

I saw the character model updates (I think?)

I'm not ready for this.
Cruella? More like transgender Michael Jackson crossdresser.
Fiora isn't supposed to be about sex appeal.
And yet they gave her a headmistress skin. That just screams modesty

her old skin had the feel of a aristocratic duelist who was proud of her skills and nobility 

her new looks would fly in a Disney story BUT NOT HERE 
even her new hair looks HIDEOUS, her new outfit feels more like something that belongs in a fashion show not a duel
She doesn't really look ugly. Just older. More importantly, she doesn't look like Fiora anymore. That is all that matters, and all that will ever matter.

You guys are weak minded. They deviate from your full face, busty chest, wide curve structure that's the same for every human female champ, and you guys cry. What, they made her chin thinner, gave her a more defined bone structure in her cheeks, now she's ugly? Too disney for you? What's Disney about it, how cartoony it looks? You mean something in League of Legends looks cartoony!? What!? Nah, all our champs are hyper-realistic, this is Metal gear solid quality stuff right here.

Get out of the forums with this obsessively exaggerated crap. Makes me sick.

> [{quoted}](name=MasqureMan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2015-07-22T16:38:05.266+0000)
>
> You guys are weak minded. They deviate from your full face, busty chest, wide curve structure that's the same for every human female champ, and you guys cry. What, they made her chin thinner, gave her a more defined bone structure in her cheeks, now she's ugly? Too disney for you? What's Disney about it, how cartoony it looks? You mean something in League of Legends looks cartoony!? What!? Nah, all our champs are hyper-realistic, this is Metal gear solid quality stuff right here.
> 
> Get out of the forums with this obsessively exaggerated crap. Makes me sick.

Maybe instead of ruining older champions to suit some hidden agenda where some women have to be made intentionally ugly to please tumblr, they make a new ugly one and leave the old ones the fuck alone?

> [{quoted}](name=Noin Lucrezia,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d0000,timestamp=2015-07-22T17:08:33.142+0000)
>
> Maybe instead of ruining older champions to suit some hidden agenda where some women have to be made intentionally ugly to please tumblr, they make a new ugly one and leave the old ones the fuck alone?

What features of her are ugly? Why?

> [{quoted}](name=MasqureMan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d00000000,timestamp=2015-07-22T20:38:33.087+0000)
>
> What features of her are ugly? Why?

The entire kit and caboodle?
The whole thing?
Everything except the shirt?

It looks _bad_.

> [{quoted}](name=MasqureMan,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d,timestamp=2015-07-22T16:38:05.266+0000)

What, they made her chin thinner, gave her a more defined bone structure in her cheeks, now she's ugly? Too disney for you? What's Disney about it, how cartoony it looks? You mean something in League of Legends looks cartoony!? What!? Nah, all our champs are hyper-realistic, this is Metal gear solid quality stuff right here.
> 
> Get out of the forums with this obsessively exaggerated crap. Makes me sick.

LOL Some kids really can't think for themselves and will defend Riot to their last breath.. even when they are wrong. Gotta love robot thinkers.

> [{quoted}](name=Wiggle Dat Butt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d0001,timestamp=2015-07-22T20:27:52.569+0000)
>
> LOL Some kids really can't think for themselves and will defend Riot to their last breath.. even when they are wrong. Gotta love robot thinkers.

Aren't you robot-thinking by just going with the initial out-roar without some degree of level-headed analyzing of the situation. I see the new splash and I think it's fine. It's in-line with the direction they've been taking all their splashes ever since Kat and Trist got theirs redone. A bit more emphasis on color, a bit more exaggeration on the length/width of the faces, and more developed, meaningful backgrounds that say something about the champ...save Kat's...>_>

I think the splash is fine. They didn't do anything wrong here. Not every champ is along the lines of Lux. Some are older and more mature. If they redid her art and model to better resemble what they envisioned in the character's age and dimensions, why is EVERYONE on their period all of a sudden?

> [{quoted}](name=chipndip1,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=002d00010001,timestamp=2015-07-23T03:16:30.816+0000)
>
> Aren't you robot-thinking by just going with the initial out-roar without some degree of level-headed analyzing of the situation. I see the new splash and I think it's fine. It's in-line with the direction they've been taking all their splashes ever since Kat and Trist got theirs redone. A bit more emphasis on color, a bit more exaggeration on the length/width of the faces, and more developed, meaningful backgrounds that say something about the champ...save Kat's...>_>
> 
> I think the splash is fine. They didn't do anything wrong here. Not every champ is along the lines of Lux. Some are older and more mature. If they redid her art and model to better resemble what they envisioned in the character's age and dimensions, why is EVERYONE on their period all of a sudden?

She's supposed to be the same age as lux though.

I agree its mostly her face that needs work, looks really skinny and frail imo. The old Royal Guard skin looks a lot better than the new one(That hat isn't fancy enough, step up your game) and I think all it really needed was a texture update. Nightraven Fiora's armor is a big improvement, Headmistress only really needed a few tweaks here and there instead of starting from fresh. The armor on default Fiora is well done. 

Think the models could've been kept nearly exactly the same with just a texture update instead of a full VU.
She has the face of Malificent and the body of that asian girl from Big Hero 6.
Technically most of the characters in Big Hero 6 were Asian. Because they were in a combination of San Francisco and Tokyo.
riot has been ruining splashes for a while.  remember went we went from great old morgana splash to how does her spine even bend that way current morgana splash?
I agree, the new artwork is terrible. She was not an old champion anyways, so why update the splash and the model? I mean they could have just updated her kit without ruining the way she looks.

In my opinion, what the splash art did was rotate Fiora 90 degrees, change her clothes, and change up the setting a bit (which has the misfortune of lightening up the red streak on her hair), and change her expression a bit.

The expression change really is the only thing that you can really say makes her less sexy, but having it make her less sexy gives a new window into her personality that wasn't completely captured in her old art. It perfectly captures her confidence (or arrogance, depending on who you talk to) in a way that the old splash art didn't, especially considering her hair covered half of her face in the old splash.

{{champion:114}} ''I came here seeking a challenge - is this the best these fools can offer me?''

> [{quoted}](name=Kamquats,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=qjdWZE3f,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-07-22T00:24:25.938+0000)
>
> In my opinion, what the splash art did was rotate Fiora 90 degrees, change her clothes, and change up the setting a bit (which has the misfortune of lightening up the red streak on her hair), and change her expression a bit.
> 
> The expression change really is the only thing that you can really say makes her less sexy, but having it make her less sexy gives a new window into her personality that wasn't completely captured in her old art. It perfectly captures her confidence (or arrogance, depending on who you talk to) in a way that the old splash art didn't, especially considering her hair covered half of her face in the old splash.
> 
> {{champion:114}} ''I came here seeking a challenge - is this the best these fools can offer me?''

That's not true, imo. Fiora's old face was soft and pretty, but the new one looks like she got some freakish plastic surgery lol. Maybe it's just my personal preference or that her face is so unnaturally angular, but her new splash is definitely less attractive for that reason.
